attributes.action: Abolish the bbc licence fee completely.
attributes.background:
The people of the uk should not be forced by law to pay a tax for a service regardless of weather they want it or not. Those who work for the bbc are overpaid, and increasingly politically motivated.
The people are fed up with being forced to pay for a bias, poor service, that serves only itself.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104367

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
